author: jacopoc
msg: Enabled link for creating a shipment for a purchase order even if it is in the created status: shipment items (plans) can now be created (without receiving the items in inventory) in order to plan the shipments; shipment and shipment events, that ppears in the calendar are a good tools to negotiate and schedule, together with the supplier the delivery dates before approving the order.

author: mlibbey
msg: Changing body width to 95% to better match tables and images

author: jacopoc
msg: New purchase order items are initially assigned to the first ship group without resetting the existing ship groups.
